title: Bloomberg Markets: Building a Computer Like Using Legos
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Building a Computer Like Using Legos
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Alex Klein Chief Executive Officer Kano Discussing the UK based start up that makes computer kits kids can build that them teach them to code.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
